documents.document:
found out yesterday...

i found out this blog yesterday.
i sign up for this blog 2yrs ago..
but i never been using this blog.
watever thus s my first journal at pan.net
i will try my best to belong more to pan.net
please excuse my eng. is bad!!

boy friend?

hahah
tday, so funny .
i went to 65st with my aunt and friends
we are girls.
but , one of my friend always act like a boy
watever the look she has , the action she has , the speech she has .,the style she wear
totally look like a boy.
when we walked on the street, theres an old man talk to my friend who acts like a boy
he said,"oh u have 3 girl friends, u are lucky boy!!"
when we heard that, we were laughing...
boyfriend..........

is this girl in the pic looks like aboy
the pic was taking by hammy(hahhaha)
we went to m?today
and we order so many french fires!!

they back to china!!

finally they went back to china
i always feel happy about that, because i can relax.
that such a great feeling!!
i will not have stress !!!
feel happy and tied!

give up is not that hard..but the feeling ..

i already accept that i always give up something...
give up the dream
give up the love i really want
yesterday, my papa told me that ar q is single now..
i know wat he wants for me
he wants me to add oil
cause i really like ar q
but i just can say
i cant cause i am doing something to let my famils dream come true
i just can feel pianful for that after i gave up
but i just can remind my self
between family and love
family is the most important thing in my life.......
feeling sad about that
but just adding oil
the sad days will become a wind in ur life
hammy remember, ur mimi and ur brothers

miss family

i just dont know how i support myself for these there years. cuz i always escape and gave up for many things
these two days i have that feeling againn
he feeling is crying
i really fucking missing my family

at yesterday, when i saw the parents came to pick up the student afters chool i just have the feeling of sad
tonight i went to papa's home and had the dinner with his family
they are normal. but they are together .they can eat the dinner together everynight
they can talk with laughing when they are eating.
that's wat i hope
such a normal thing how cant i get that ?

just never try be together

watever i miss my family!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

i knew that

i knew that i am stupid
i never been smart for my entire life even today
+is right even shes joking
but i just dont know why
i did everything were slower than someone else
i did everything were more stupid
just dont know how to become a smart girl

who knows

Why do you look so familiar
I could swear that I have seen your face before
I think I like that you seem sincere
I think I'd like to get to know you a little bit more
I think there's something more
Life's worth living for
Who knows what could happen
Do what you do
Just keep on laughing
One thing's true
There's always a brand new day
I'm gonna live today like it's my last day
How do you always have an opinion
And how do you always find the best way to compromise
We don't need to have a reason
We don't need anything we're just wasting time
I think there's something more
Life's worth living for
Who knows what could happen
Do what you do
Just keep on laughing
One thing's true
There's always a brand new day
I think there's something more
Life's worth living for
Who knows what could happen
Do what you do
Just keep on laughing
One thing's true
There's always a brand new day
I'm gonna live today like it's my last day
Find yourself
'Cause I can't find you
Be yourself
Who are you?
Find yourself
'Cause I can't find you
Be yourself
Who are you?
Who knows what could happen
Do what you do
Just keep on laughing
One thing's true
There's always a brand new day
So you go and make it happen
Do your best
Just keep on laughing
I'm telling you
There's always a brand new day
Who knows what could happen
Do what you do
Just keep on laughing
One thing's true
There's always a brand new day
I'm gonna live today like it's my last day

lord i really need ur help

should i goback ???
to gz ,
the beautiful and peaseful place
i want to be with my family
but i really need to givwe uo something thats freedom
i might get the freedom in my future
i might get it after my 18s birthday
but if i go back , i cant get it soon.
wat can i choose?
freeedom or family...
i really feel f...king tied to think these stuffes
i want taro's help but i really need u lord!!

u are very important except for my family

do you know ?tonight i finally contact you
my friend i always worry about you past few years
we had been together just half year then, you went to ca
actually i never call ur name when i be with other friends
i always hide my feeling
i really know the feeling when you went to ca but u didnt tell me
that hurt me why do you go without let me know
but, i still want to be with you cause u are my best friend
i came here by myself, idont have family here.....
you are the first person let me feel warm and happy in the us
when you said taht u would come with me?
i really want but always i thought about my family
i ever lost my promise i cant go to ca univer.
but now watever your decision
i will try my best to do well on my own
and also, i hope you can come ack

dont treat me like the family

tonight, i had a long conversation wth my x guardian
because she received the letter from school
the health class,
i want to kill the teacher long time ago
even she wanted me to do better

i was crying not for the letter
its for you guys
i already 18
my connection with u guys alredy finish
i am not depend on you now please
i know you guys are good are care abut me
but, please dont treat me like the family
because i never treat u guys like the family
i must let u guys know that

p.s. please just let me go

leaving..

dont worry i will be back
guys anythin u can forget but me
i will remember everything
the fantasy memory

i just argue with my mother

i didnt know y i argue with my mother
i love my mother very much
maybe, i just want to set up my rule.
i am not that well
that's not mean i am not a good daughter
i just want her to know i have my own decision
even the way i do is not correct
but i wnt to do it
not i want to
i dont know
i really dont want to go us
i never believe that ghost stuff
even till i die
i still dont believe

again???

everynight i always think about the same problem
wat the helllllllllllllllllllllllll with future!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
dont really want to think about it!!!!!!!!!!

i cant even think about my future

how can i think about my future
my family is the most important part in my life
i hurt them
i feel so sorry
first brother will punish me
second brother will not forgive me
??????????
mimi sorry
hammy lv dont cry

?? ????????????
????????
?? ??? mimi
??????

??????????

? ??????? ?????
i hate the fucking feeling
there are too many stuffes i cant handle and write down
nardo ???mimi?

act like my family

u did that like my brother
